title: CPR: Causal Physiological Representation Learning for Robust ECG Analysis under Distribution Shifts
summary: Deep learning models for Electrocardiogram (ECG) diagnosis have achieved remarkable accuracy but exhibit fragility against adversarial perturbations, particularly Smooth Adversarial Perturbations (SAP) that mimic biological morphology.
